last_episode_to_air.name: The Final Twist
last_episode_to_air.overview: As Nicole and Jermeshia gear up for their pivotal Luxe Launch, others are scheming with hidden agendas; Joy reveals long-buried secrets, JaQuita confronts Monay, Lakeshia faces her father, and Nicole clashes over adoption with Larry.

name: Family Empire Houston
overview: The series follows the multi-generational Braden family of Houston, Texas. Exploring themes of generational wealth and the building of a family legacy, the eight-part unscripted series follows the Bradens across four generations. Sister cousins Nicole, Jermeshia and JaQuita have a collective dream to follow in the footsteps of their grandmother and the Braden family matriarch, Oscarene, a real estate entrepreneur who built the family empire from the ground up.

episodes.name: Meet the Bradens!
episodes.overview: Everything's bigger in Texas, especially the Braden family. Across four generations of Black excellence, they're a tight-knit circle, navigating work and drama. Pursuing their legacy, tensions may rise, but they always find a way back to each other.

episodes.name: Skeletons in the Family Closet
episodes.overview: Nicole and Lakeshia confront decades of estrangement. Meanwhile, Jermeshia seeks approval from her grandmother to develop the land, unaware of hidden obstacles. A night out with the men reveals the challenges of being married into the Braden family.

episodes.name: Lakeshia's Secret
episodes.overview: Lakeshia's girlfriend, Karamell, threatens to reveal her secret. Cracks surface as Jermeshia and Nicole navigate their relationship and the pursuit of Oscarene's land. Nicole and Oscarene meet privately. Chris contemplates his future at Braden.

episodes.name: Kara Melt-down
episodes.overview: Secrets unravel as tensions explode over Lakeshia and Karamell's relationship. Nicole's offer leaves Chris in shock. On their anniversary, JaQuita serves up some demands of her own. Nicole and Jermeshia are left in the dark when a relative ghosts them.

episodes.name: Showdown at the Hoedown
episodes.overview: Jermeshia employs a problematic strategy in pursuit of legacy. Nicole and Larry's opposing opinions on adoption create conflict. Lakeshia and Nicole discuss family secrets in therapy. The Bradens' Rodeo Round Up generates more dust than a bucking bull!

episodes.name: The Boiling Point
episodes.overview: A long-buried family secret is unearthed, igniting a confrontation that spans generations. Meanwhile, Nicole is caught in the midst of the turmoil while Lakeshia searches for answers about her childhood. Also, Jermeshia and JaQuita receive devastating news.

episodes.name: Pitch (Im)Perfect
episodes.overview: When tempers reach a boiling point, the family reels from revelations of long-held secrets, leaving everyone on edge; amidst the chaos, Jermeshia prepares for her long-awaited pitch, but the tense atmosphere threatens to derail her dream of legacy.

episodes.name: The Final Twist
episodes.overview: As Nicole and Jermeshia gear up for their pivotal Luxe Launch, others are scheming with hidden agendas; Joy reveals long-buried secrets, JaQuita confronts Monay, Lakeshia faces her father, and Nicole clashes over adoption with Larry.
